subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Lakers Coach Phil Jackson has a penchant for brutal honesty. He wouldn’t fit in with the Knicks, who who forbid coaches to speak freely and discourage them from uttering a controversial word.
snippet: Lakers Coach Phil Jackson has a penchant for brutal honesty. He wouldn’t fit in with the Knicks, who who forbid coaches to speak freely and discourage them from uttering a controversial word.
